name: NightStalker 3D Ep.1 Into Darkness
description:
Darkness has overtaken the world, all the creatures of the night have

schemed a devilish plan to keep the earth dark forever and destroy all 
who inhabit it. The only thing stopping them, the nightstalker. 
Luscius Night the only man with the guns and strength to destroy
all the creatures of darkness, the last of an ancient clan of warriors
sworn to protect the world of the living from the world of the damned.
Now as the odds stack up and evil takes hold, you're the only person
badass enough to stop the hordes of undead from completing their plan!
From vampires, to zombie, to possessed humans, and even evil wizards,
you're in for one hell of a fight.
